content:
The FHIR Validator we are using is able to verify FHIR resources (using HL7/HAPI FHIR libs).
It's been extended to cover FHIIR Messages and also works with NHS Digitals Ontology Server (for UK SNOMED and dm+d codesystems).

I'm experimenting extending it to validate/test OAS specifications, which is starting to bring in FHIR SearchParameter and OperationDefinition.
Considering covering CapabilityStatements - do developers want that or would OAS (open API specification) be enough?
